name: Backgammon66
description:
The only Full Game MultiPlayer Backgammon Game Service.
This is not a cheap Template which does not work properly.
Full working Online Backgammon Service with 4 plays modes.
-AI Mode
You could play against computer whose skill is professional
-Random Play
You could see various number of games from other players in random, and could play against any other player
-Play with Friend
You could enjoy with your friend by searching with friend name
-Tournament Play
You could play game in tournament mode
In each game modes, you can set suitable price to win.
This price can modified during game by using double stakes.
